originalText.text: Had a clean done by Beverly, a new member of the team who was very good and professional! I also had X-Ray done by Lindy who is a long timer in the office. She is always assisting with whatever help is needed!  She does all these with a quiet smile! Her level of customer service is outstanding! Dr Bauer is simply the best! His attention to details can be seen in every single work he provides to his clients! The Christmas decorations was done by Domingo, who welcomes us customers and works closely with Dr. Bauer!

text.text: Had a clean done by Beverly, a new member of the team who was very good and professional! I also had X-Ray done by Lindy who is a long timer in the office. She is always assisting with whatever help is needed!  She does all these with a quiet smile! Her level of customer service is outstanding! Dr Bauer is simply the best! His attention to details can be seen in every single work he provides to his clients! The Christmas decorations was done by Domingo, who welcomes us customers and works closely with Dr. Bauer!

originalText.text: I just had a cleaning (best I ever had), exam, and crown made and installed by Dr. Bauer. It was a wonderful experience. He is a class act. He did not talk down to me: he sat down on my level, we both looked at the xrays, he described what he saw, offered a treatment plan, and was open to input every step of the way. Above and beyond the skilled dentistry, utilizing the latest technology (crown fits beautifully), he genuinely cares about the comfort and well being of his patients: the dental chair has a wedge that raises your knees and reduces pressure on your lower back, there’s also a little pillow to support your neck. His kindness is palpable, it extends to his staff as well, they reflect that back, and the whole place has a great feeling. He raises everyone up. I complimented one staff member on his beautiful handwriting, he said Dr. Bauer made him want to improve his handwriting. Dr. Bauer is also conscious of affordability, and offers to work with you if that’s an issue. I am impressed, and thankful for the dental care he provides.

originalText.text: I am new to the neighborhood. I am so glad to find a good dentist. Staffs are kind and friendly. Hands down the best dentist in this neighborhood. Dr. Bauer is professional and honest. I had to take my baby sometimes they helped us during the visit.

originalText.text:
The best feeling is to go to your dentist and be at ease knowing that you’re in good hands.. Dr. Bauer is very down to earth and genuine. He wants the best for his patients and it shows with the service and advises he provides.. His team A+
GREAT PLACE.. TOTALLY RECOMMEND!! HANDS DOWN

originalText.text: Dr. Bauer earned my trust by providing an honest opinion about my dental needs without pushing unnecessary treatments. He places the needs of his patients above all else and his skillful and compassionate approach is truly reassuring. The exceptional organization and the cleanliness of the state of the art dental office made the visit a breeze.  Both Dr. Bauer and his warm and friendly team are simply the Best!
